description: This file defines a UI component named 'Button' using the LightningJS framework. It specifies the component's template, manages internal state variables 'isFavorited', 'favoriteText', and 'unfavoriteText', and handles input actions such as toggling the 'isFavorited' state on 'enter' input.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component that renders a button which toggles between favorited and unfavorited states when the enter key is pressed.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes component state with 'isFavorited' and text labels.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles 'enter' key press to toggle the 'isFavorited' state.
